arts.ttl: “The main focus now” – Fabrizio Romano reports Liverpool’s main priority in January
arts.sum: Liverpool will be active in the market next year to make new signings and strengthen their squad to stay at the top. arts.ttl: Exclusive: Liverpool eyeing signings in both full-back positions
arts.sum: Liverpool are eyeing up signings at both right-back and left-back in the months ahead, sources have told CaughtOffside. The Reds are facing the worrying situation of losing Trent Alexander-Arnold on a free transfer, with the England international nearing the end of his contract at Anfield.
